sentences.english: Early symptoms of epilepsy have shown why?
sentences.chinese: 羊角風的早期症狀都表現爲什麼？
羊角風的危害具體有哪些呢？

sentences.english: Epilepsy is also known as epilepsy, is a common disease.
sentences.chinese: 癲癇又被稱爲羊角風，是一種常見的疾病。
